attributes.action: Immediately ban the further production of 'low energy'  fluorescent light bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These highly polluting, expensive to create & recycle bulbs are a danger to the environment and the user. They contain toxic materials and can cause migraine attacks.
The slow warm up time makes them not only unpleasant to live with but can be dangerous.
They can also be a source of radio frequency 'pollution'.
